BR_text.BRsummary: The utilization is not the actually GPU utilization
BR_text.BRdescription:
0.18 UI
 The current utilization is node usage percentage, not the GPU utilization. Node using information is already in the available node. We should show GPU utilization on that VC.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/77527843-df2c6f80-6ec7-11ea-883f-1e8101092258.png></denchmark-link>
